content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 181.11 - Allocation of costs between electric plant and operating expenses to be made currently

State Regulations

Each utility shall determine currently the costs which
are applicable to the electric plant accounts and in the case of costs
involving allocations, the amount which is applicable to other accounts, such
as operating expenses, taxes, depreciation reserve (cost of plant removal), other balance sheet accounts, and income or surplus accounts; the intent of
this provision being that such costs shall be allocated to the accounts to
which they are applicable when they are incurred. Notes
